start.title: Registrera dig som kandidat
start.content:
Welcome to the Voting Advice Application!

To register as a candidate, you must first verify your identity using a Bank ID. When the candidate list is published on {date}, we will publish your profile in the app if you are on that list. We will use your full name and birthdate to verify this.

To complete your registration, follow these steps:

step.identification: Identify yourself using a Bank ID

success.title: Bank ID login is complete
success.content:
Welcome to the Voting Advice Application, {firstName} {lastName}!

Click the button below to continue the registration process.

identification.identifyYourselHelpText: Opens in a separate window. You will return to this page once the identification is complete.

electionSelect.title: Which elections will you run in?
electionSelect.content:
There are multiple elections due on {date}.

Select the elections are you going to stand in.

constituencySelect.title: What is your home municipality?
constituencySelect.content: Select your municipality so that we know which constituency you will be running in.

emailVerification.title: Enter email address
emailVerification.content:
In the future, your email address will act as your username. Please enter it below twice to confirm it's correct.

You will also need to accept the terms of use in order to continue.
emailVerification.termsCheckbox: I accept the terms of use for registering as a candidate

success.title: Confirm your email address
success.content:
We've sent a message to your email address.

Please click on the link in the message to confirm your email address and complete the registration process.

strongIdentificationError.title: There was an issue with Bank ID identification
strongIdentificationError.content:
Click the button below to try again or contact support if the problem persists.

support@openvaa.org

tokenExpiredError.title: Your session has expired
tokenExpiredError.content: Please identify yourself again to complete the registration process.

candidateExistsError.title: You are already registered as a candidate
candidateExistsError.content:
It looks like you are already registered. Please check your email to confirm your registration. Once the registration is confirmed, you can login with your email and password.

Contact support if you believe there is an error.

support@openvaa.org

loggedInError.title: You are already logged in
loggedInError.content: You're already registered as a candidate! Head over to your account to continue.

unknownError.title: Something went wrong
unknownError.content:
Click the button below to try again or contact support if the problem persists.

support@openvaa.org
